1. Wrist Flexion/Extension \n With Shoulder at 0, elbow at 90
0 = no volitional movement\n1 = partial movement\n2 = full, controlled movement

3. Wrist Flexion/Extension \n With Shoulder at 30-90, elbow at 0
0 = no volitional movement\n1 = partial movement\n2 = full, controlled movement

d. Spherical Grasp With Tennis Ball
